title: Science Curriculum Design for Sustainable Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Science field job-linked education for in-service professionals, requiring efficient learning design considering carbon emission reduction

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply self-directed time management and online learning skills in blended learning environments.
Learners will be able to design and implement science experiment projects linked to twice-weekly offline classes.
Learners will be able to evaluate sustainable learning methods (reducing commuting, utilizing digital resources) and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
